1.title: Sour Grapes
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Recently dumped by "the One", Greg struggles to put on a brave face for the world. Whether it's working as a postie or just taking a shower, he cannot stop thinking about Teresa. Which means tears are just around the corner. With the help of Tom, his endearing but often inappropriate best friend, Greg begins to date again when Tom sets him up an online dating profile. Only problem is Greg cannot get over Teresa. No matter who the date is, Greg sees Teresa over and over - A prequel / spin off to The Adventures of Suzy Boon, Cheeky First Dates follows the origin story of Suzy's first online date, a crude and disgusting guy who goes by the name of Cheeky37. He wasn't always talking about "punching mud" - in fact, he was actually a lovely guy.
imdb.title: Cheeky First Dates
plot: Recently dumped by "the One", Greg struggles to put on a brave face for the world. Whether it's working as a postie or just taking a shower, he cannot stop thinking about Teresa. Which means tears are just around the corner.::CFD
